title: 2022 Vegetable School - Intro to High Tunnel Vegetable Production

subtasks: Talking about the benefits of high-tunnels, such as extending growing seasons
Discussing how high-tunnels can mitigate weather-related risks
Highlighting the importance of proper planting dates and crop rotation
Recommending high-value crops for high-tunnel production
Emphasizing soil fertility and nutrient management
Stressing the importance of irrigation, particularly drip irrigation
Advising on pest management, including integrated pest management (IPM) practices
Discussing marketing strategies and optimizing profits through crop diversity and season extension
